ceo_buyer.justification: Sipa Managing Director Andrew Muir commented:...

interest_acquired_percent.justification: Sipa agrees to purchase Buru Energy Limited’s 50% share of the Barbwire Terrace Project, to move to 100% ownership.

currency.justification: The values are given in '$' and the buyer, Sipa Resources, is an Australian company (ASX: SRI), so currency is inferred as AUD.

cash_payments_raw.justification: Consideration for the purchase is explicitly stated as a royalty; no cash payment is mentioned for the acquisition itself.

share_payments_raw.justification: Consideration is a royalty; no share-based payment is mentioned.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: Not applicable as consideration is a royalty.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: No share issuance is mentioned as part of the transaction.

issued_share_price.justification: No share price is mentioned as part of the transaction.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: No future exploration commitment in meters is specified as part of this deal.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: No future exploration commitment in monetary terms is specified as part of this deal.

exploration_commitment_desc.value: Sipa will refine and prioritise multiple remaining targets to assess the next steps.
exploration_commitment_desc.justification: Multiple targets remain to be tested at the project and Sipa will refine and prioritise these to assess the next steps, as part of its ongoing portfolio review...

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: Consideration for the purchase is a 0.6% Net Smelter Return royalty.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The document does not specify the area of the Barbwire Terrace Project in hectares or km².

coverage_area_unit.justification: The document does not specify the area of the Barbwire Terrace Project.

resource_size_desc.justification: The announcement states the project has achieved 'proof of concept' status but does not provide a formal JORC-compliant resource estimate.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: Sipa Resources Limited (ASX: SRI) (“Sipa” or “the Company”) is pleased to advise...
